caption.p: 3D & 2D docked view of thiazole coumarins in active site of fungal target. Dotted lines showed the binding interactions with key amino acids. a) 5a docked in the active site, b) 5a among the key amino acid residues of the protein, c) 5b docked in the active site, d) 5b among the key amino acid residues of the protein, e) 5d docked in the active site, f) 5d among the key amino acid residues of the protein.
